DOC.brief_summary: This follow-up study core study NCT00269672 ( 6115A1-500 ) . This study evaluate safety , tolerability , immunogenicity 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine ( 13vPnC ) administer subject already receive one dose 13vPnC , one dose 23-valent pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine ( 23vPS ) one year later . This study determine subsequent dose 13vPnC one year later result similar great immune response ( body 's ability protect disease ) measure initial dose 13vPnC .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Elderly Subjects
DOC.criteria: Previous participant study 6115A1500 receive 13vPnC +AlPO4 / 23vPS Generally healthy male female adult 65 year age old Available duration trial approximately 1 month No history severe adverse reaction associate vaccine MMSE score less equal 21 exclusion criterion .
